name: Ragnarok: Destiny of the Gods
description:
Ragnarok has arrived. The worlds go on fire, the armies of Muspelheim and Hel fight the gods in the ultimate battle. Chaos and anarchy reign the worlds. The wolf escapes form his ties and devours everything in his site with no distinction.

Join Vidar, one of the sons of Odin, in his adventure to save his father. Be prepared to face numerous dangers like traps, undead archers or fire creatures from Muspellheim.

DEV notes - This is was my first game I made back in 2018, being the first one I'm quite proud of it. The music and the sound effects are not mine but I couldn't find the original artists from since.
